alert.note: Alert for Hamilton (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Tornado Watch issued March 12 at 4:18PM EDT until March 12 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: TORNADO WATCH 67 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 8 PM EDT THIS EVENING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN FLORIDA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 1 COUNTY IN NORTHERN FLORIDA HAMILTON IN GEORGIA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 10 COUNTIES IN SOUTHEAST GEORGIA ATKINSON BRANTLEY CAMDEN CHARLTON CLINCH ECHOLS GLYNN PIERCE WARE WAYNE THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ATKINSON, AXSON, BELMONT, BLACKSHEAR, COUNTRY CLUB ESTATE, DOCK JUNCTION, DOCTORTOWN, DOVER BLUFF, DUNGENESS, FOLKSTON, GARDI, GLYNN HAVEN, HICKOX, HOBOKEN, HOMELAND, HOMERVILLE, HORTENSE, JASPER, JEKYLL ISLAND, JENNINGS, JESUP, KINGSLAND, NAHUNTA, NEEDHAM, NEEDMORE, PEARSON, RACE POND, RAYBON, SEA ISLAND, ST. GEORGE, ST. SIMONS, STATENVILLE, STEPHEN FOSTER STATE PARK, THALMANN, WAYCROSS, WAYNESVILLE, WEST LAKE, WHITE SPRINGS, WILLACOOCHEE, AND WINOKUR.
